## Table of Contents

- [Installation](#installation)
- [Quick Example](#quick-start)

## Installation

```bash
$ yarn add @uprise/text 
# or
$ npm i @uprise/text --save
```

## Quick Start

This will render text inputs :

```javascript
import { P, Bold, Note, Tiny, Small, ExtraSmall, Medium } from '@uprise/text'
```
